<template lineStart="1"><title>warning</title><part><name index="1"/><value>Since Arma 3 v1.63.137869, the previous functionality of this command (score table visibility check) is moved to [[visibleScoretable]] command. </value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Number]] - 0: Force hidden, 1: Force shown, -1: Default </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value>
